mapper.select: SELECT r.sales_rt_date sales_rt_date , p.prod_name prod_name , a.act_name act_name , o.sales_out_amt sales_out_amt , r.sales_rt_amt sales_rt_amt , (o.sales_out_amt - r.sales_rt_amt) as total FROM sales_rt r JOIN com_prod p ON (r.prod_code = p.prod_code) JOIN sales_out o ON (r.sales_out_code = o.sales_out_code) JOIN com_act a ON ( o.act_code = a.act_code) ORDER BY sales_rt_code
